ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups bite-size corn square cereal (such as Corn Chex®)
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces
¼ cup oil for frying, or as needed

cookingTips: Pulse cereal to varied crumb sizes for texture
Dip in egg then cereal for double coating
Fry at medium-high heat to prevent soggy coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does corn cereal provide crunch without gluten? What oil temperature ensures crispy coating?
